pullrequest.title: Model becomes transparent while being manpulated

content.raw:
Thank you for the contribution! We will be reviewing this shortly. 

One thing I noticed already though is that this might change the original transparency of models which weren't fully opaque in the first place. 
The part which sets the model to be semi-transparent seems to be the same as the logic used in [ModelAlign](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/80a47d8eb0ea7cd8b09b951670e765b91c80273e/gazebo/gui/ModelAlign.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#ModelAlign.cc-357), but the part making it opaque again should probably be something like `std::abs(_vis->GetTransparency()*2.0-1.0)` instead of zero.

Another suggestion is to add a unit test for the new functionality.
